sentences.en: Good teachers have insight into the problems of students.
sentences.cn: 好的教师能洞察学生的问题.

sentences.en: Hardly less enjoyment and insight are to be got from Adams's correspondence.
sentences.cn: 我们还可以从亚当斯的书信里得到同样的乐趣和洞见.

sentences.en: He had the insight to recognize their talents.
sentences.cn: 他很有眼力，慧眼识英才。

sentences.en: He has just a thimbleful of insight into human behavior.
sentences.cn: 他对人们的行为只有一点点见识.

sentences.en: He is a man of great insight.
He was a man with considerable insight.
sentences.cn: 他是个富有洞察力的人。

sentences.en: His autobiography provides an illuminating insight into his mind.
sentences.cn: 他的自传可以让读者深入洞察他的精神世界。

sentences.en: Physical insight is valuable in using the finite element method.
sentences.cn: 在利用有限方法时,物理上的观点是有价值的.

sentences.en: The book gives us fascinating insights into life in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 这本书生动地表现了墨西哥的生活。

sentences.en: The novelist has a subtle insight into human nature.
sentences.cn: 那位小说家对人性具有敏锐的眼力.

sentences.en: The research will provide direct insight into molecular mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 这项研究将使人能够直接地了解分子的机理.

sentences.en: These texts give the reader an insight into the Chinese mind.
sentences.cn: 这些文章使读者对中国人的思维有了深层次的认识。

sentences.en: This has yielded a result, but it has not increased our insight.
sentences.cn: 这给出了结果, 但并未开扩我们的眼界.

sentences.en: This speech gave Jeanie a dark insight into Madge's history.
sentences.cn: 这些话使珍妮对玛吉的身世有了个大致的了解.

sentences.en: We are beginning to have some insight into drug therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始对药物治疗有了一些深入了解。

words.tran_cn: 有深刻见解的，富有洞察力的

trans.tran_en: the ability to understand and realize what people or situations are really like
